page.title: 19DEVIL'S CHURCHYARD
page.content:
The Devil's Churchyard is just a piece of ground with nothing but trees on it. It is believed that the reason for this is that people have tried to build a church there three times, but each time it fell down - the work of the Devil. My gramp (sic) has seen the Devil's carriage, one misty night when he was coming home from work he was just passing the Devil's Churchyard when a man dressed in red ran out into the middle of the road. He swerved to miss him, but when he got out of the car there was no-one there. My Gramp has never been near there again, for he believed it was the Devil.
{SADIE WHITE, aged 10
